name: Witch Ring Meister
description: Management simulation idle game Witch Ring Meister, you'll become Marietta from the gem store, manage your store, grow with your partners, aim for the prize of "Miss Design"!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or above Processor: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
